articles.title: Sania Mirza to retire after Dubai WTA 1000 in February - Rediff.com
articles.description: India's greatest women's tennis player won six Grand Slam doubles titles and will compete in her final major this month at the Australian Open, where she bagged the women's doubles crown in 2016.
articles.content:
'I turned pro in 2003. Priorities change, and now my priority is not to push my body to the limit every single day.'
